entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY , Contrecoeur
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:25 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -8.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: L'Assomption 10:00 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

Pressure / Tendency: 99.6 kPa rising
Humidity: 74 %

Dewpoint: -11.9°C
Wind: SSW 36 km/h gust 47 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending near midnight then cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
